key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.pdf.AdvancedSettingsAvailable
key.description: Defines, whether the Advanced-Export-Settings tab will be available in the export dialog.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.pdf.Dialog
key.description: The export dialog implementation to use. This is a implementation configuration.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.pdf.MetaDataSettingsAvailable
key.description: Defines, whether the Document-Meta-Data tab will be available in the export dialog. The Document-Meta-Data-Tab allows to edit the Author, Keywords, Description and Title of the report.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.pdf.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.pdf.ProgressDialogEnabled
key.description: Defines, whether the progress dialog should be visible when exporting the report.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.pdf.StoreDialogContents
key.description: Defines, whether the export dialogs will store the user-input for each report. Set this property to false, if you are concerned about any privacy leaks.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.pdf.export.add-to-menu
key.description: Defines, whether this Action will be added to the menu.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.pdf.export.add-to-toolbar
key.description: Defines, whether this Action will be added to the toolbar.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.pdf.export.menu-order
key.description: Defines the sort-order of this Action in the menu. The sort-order is relative to all other Actions in the same menu.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.pdf.export.role
key.description: Defines the action-role for this Action.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.pdf.export.role-preference
key.description: Defines the preference weight, this Action get over all other actions with the same role name. The action with the largest weight will win.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.pdf.export.separated
key.description: Defines, whether this Action will be separated from other action in the same menu.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.pdf.export.toolbar-order
key.description: Defines the sort-order of this Action in the toolbar. The sort-order is relative to all other Actions in the toolbar.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.swing.actions.export.pdf
key.description: A system level property that defines the menu-structure.
